description:
Hey, did you know?   If you write your crush`s name on your eraser then use it up, he`ll fall in love with you! Hey, Satou-kun dropped his eraser…Ah ha! Itou-san`s nage is written on Satou-kun`s eraser! That must mean…Satou-kun…Satou-kun`s in love with Itou-san! Huh?  You don`t remember writing it?  Oh come now…Hmm?  Oga-chin?  What`s wrong? It`s not Satou-kun`s handwriting? H-How can you tell?
Source: crunchyroll
